term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - back scatter coefficient in in situ microanalysis
term.title: back scatter coefficient

item.text: Number of back scattered electrons (BSEs) generated per primary electron for a given specimen and experimental condition. It depends on (mean) atomic number of the excited area of the sample, angle between electron beam and sample surface, primary electron energy and thickness of the sample.

item.title: back scattered electrons (BSEs) (in in situ microanalysis)
primary electron (in in situ microanalysis) (in in situ microanalysis)
back scattered electrons (BSEs) (in in situ microanalysis)
primary electron (in in situ microanalysis) (in in situ microanalysis)
atomic number (in in situ microanalysis) (in in situ microanalysis)
angle (in in situ microanalysis) (in in situ microanalysis)

sources.item: PAC, 1983, 55, 2023. 'Nomenclature, symbols and units recommended for in situ microanalysis (Provisional)' on page 2026 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198355122023)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
